name: Stretchy Clown
description:
Created this game in 1 day! Made for MASHUP GAME JAM based on theme: Size Matters :)

You play as a stretchy clown. Your aim is to dodge the obstacles and collect coins by stretching your legs wide apart! 

Controls:
UP Arrow -> Stretch Up

DOWN ARROW -> Split down

LEFT/RIGHT ARROW -> Move left right

This is an infinite runner! Comment your high score!!
